name: Disrupting PSN Information Networks
description: Undermining the communication structures PSNs use to spread disinformation and maintain control.

cards.title: Decoding Their Playbook
cards.description: Understanding how PSNs build and maintain their information networks.
bulletpoints: Mapping the structure of their media, social, and interpersonal networks.
Identifying key influencers and disruptors within their communication web.
Tracing the flow of misinformation to disrupt its distribution.

cards.title: Disinformation Sabotage Tactics
cards.description: Destroying the credibility of PSN disinformation through targeted interventions.
bulletpoints: Injecting disruptive counter-factuals that create internal conflict.
Leveraging whistleblowers and insiders to break their illusion of authority.
Using layered disinformation reversal strategies to collapse their narrative.

cards.title: Breaking Their Echo Chambers
cards.description: Weakening the closed-loop reinforcement PSNs rely on to manipulate followers.
bulletpoints: Flooding their spaces with alternative perspectives that challenge their messaging.
Using ethical infiltration to guide their members toward independent thought.
Leveraging cognitive fatigue to overload their system with contradictions.
